pages.text: And (whether) you hide your word or manifest it, He is the Knower of what the bosoms (hearts) possess
Will He Who created not know, when He is the Subtilely Informed
He it is Who has made the earth subdued for you, so move about in its surroundings and eat from His provision and to Him will be the return after death
Or are you secure from Him Who is in the sky, that He will (not) make the earth sink with you when it is repeatedly shaken (during an earth quake)
Or are you secure from Him Who is in the sky, that He will (not) send on you a sandstorm (or volcanic debris)? Then you will know how My warning was
And those before them indeed denied, then how was My rejection (of them)
Or did they not see towards the birds above them, spreading and contracting (their wings)? No one holds them except the Beneficent (Allah), He is certainly the Seer of everything
Or who is it that will act as an army for you to help you, besides the Beneficent (Allah)? The infidels are in nothing but deception
Or who is it who will provide for you if He withholds His provision? No, they persist in revolt and hatred
Then, is he who walks headlong on his face better guided or he who walks balanced (on his feet and) on the straight path
Say, “He it is Who produced you and made for you (the faculties of) hearing and seeing and the hearts, little is the gratitude you show.”
Say, “He it is Who has multiplied (and spread) you in the earth and towards Him you will be gathered.”
And they say, “When will this promise (be fulfilled) if you are truthful?”
Say, “The knowledge (of it) is only with Allah and I am only a clear warner.”
